attributes.action: ensure in law that the process to store and retain people’s NHS health records in computerised databases is protected so that it can never be sold to or viewed by anyone or organisation outside the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All patient records are being transferred to a database. Although currently this information is intended for review by Healthcare professionals only to aid diagnosis and treatment of the patient I am concerned that such information may, in the future, be sold for profit by the NHS, as has happened with our private information in other fields eg: the sale of car licence details by the DVLA.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
